casebody.data:
William L. Cole, Respondent v. The New York Elevated Railroad Company, et al., Appellants. Decided June 1, 1891. Appeal by defendants from judgment entered on findings at special term. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. Peckham & Tyler, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and McAdam, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
